turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Technical support.
turn.1: what are the benefits of outsourcing technical support to a third party?
turn.2: For businesses needing to provide technical support, outsourcing allows them to maintain a high availability of service.
turn.3: why is there a need for this?
turn.4: Such need may result from peaks in call volumes during the day, periods of high activity due to introduction of new products or maintenance service packs, or the requirement to provide customers with a high level of service at a low cost to the business.
turn.5: what else can you tell me of interest?
turn.6: For businesses needing technical support assets, outsourcing enables their core employees to focus more on their work in order to maintain productivity.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: It also enables them to utilize specialized personnel whose technical knowledge base and experience may exceed the scope of the business, thus providing a higher level of technical support to their employees.
turn.9: what is the most important fact in this article?
turn.10: Technical support is often subdivided into tiers, or levels, in order to better serve a business or customer base.
turn.12: The number of levels a business uses to organize their technical support group is dependent on a business' needs regarding their ability to sufficiently serve their customers or users.
